backend/main.mo: Defines core hotel-booking actor with data models for hotels, rooms, bookings, payments, invites, and access control using mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or tooling consumption.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens with neutral and orange accents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up page metadata, favicon, root mount point, and script entry.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Markdown regression checklist covering authentication, hotel/room management, booking flow, and persistence testing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, auth/role guards, React Query client, layout shell, and global providers.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports a constant containing the build version string.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin panel component that fetches and displays all bookings in a sortable table with status badges and detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Displays a table of hotels with controls to toggle active status and update subscription status, using query hooks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Allows admins to generate and manage invite tokens for hotels, including principal validation and clipboard copy actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access‑denied message with role requirements and optionally displays a hotel activation form.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Renders an error screen for permission check failures with retry and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Provides UI for validating and consuming invite tokens to activate a hotel account, with status indicators and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Blocks access until a logged‑in user without a profile submits basic information through a modal form.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and requires Internet Identity login, showing a login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Wrapper component that checks user role, admin status, and optional hotel activation before rendering children, showing loading or access-denied states as needed.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Dialog displaying full booking details with optional guest principal copying and status, date, guest count, and price information.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Form for creating a booking by selecting dates and guests, calculating price, and submitting a createBooking mutation.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Renders a styled badge showing a booking's status with variant and label mapping.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Modal dialog that displays a large preview of an image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Debug-only panel showing authentication info, user role, admin state, and hotel activation using various queries.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Panel listing bookings for the caller’s hotel with status badges and detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Panel to view, add, and remove a hotel’s payment methods with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Form panel that loads and edits hotel profile fields with validation and submits updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Displays eligible bookings and allows marking stays as completed using a mutation.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Shows room photos with fallback handling, thumbnails, and optional compact display mode.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Manages creation and editing of hotel rooms, including image uploads and room listing display.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Displays hotel subscription and visibility status with contextual badges and payment instructions when needed.
Layout wrapper with top navigation, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Provides a locale selector UI component currently supporting English.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Navigation bar showing links based on authentication, user role, and hotel profile state with login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Displays admin contact and payment instructions for hotel activation or subscription with WhatsApp and email actions.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Shows a hotel's payment methods and provides contact buttons; falls back to contact-only view when no methods exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as roles, profiles, hotels, and invite tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Provides a hook to upload images by converting them to data URLs and tracking upload progress.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Defines a locale context with persistence to localStorage and a hook for accessing and updating the current locale.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays user identity, role, hotel access, invite token handling, and admin actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders admin panels for managing invite tokens, hotel visibility, and bookings.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Lists available hotels with representative images and navigation to hotel details.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Shows guest account details and booking history with navigation to browse hotels or view booking details.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Hosts hotel management tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription, loading the hotel profile first.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Displays hotel details, rooms, photos, and booking UI with loading/error handling and image preview support.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Renders the main menu with navigation to guest or hotel portals based on authentication and role.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Provides a helper to detect debug mode via dev environment or URL param.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Defines currency symbols, names, and functions for formatting and validating money values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, and issues related to implementing room photo display and permissions.
